name: Brazilian Bum Bum Jet Set
about: What it is:A travel-ready, body-loving collection set to fly with a trio of best-loved products in the cult-fave Brazilian Bum Bum Cream Cheirosa '62 scent..Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:These best-loved, travel-friendly minis include the iconic Brazilian Bum Bum Cream, Brazilian 4 Play Shower Cream-Gel, and Brazilian Crush Body Fragrance Mist for a head-to-toe fragrance blended with addictive notes of pistachio and salted caramel. This set helps keep you bodylicious, irresistible, and all set to fly. Bum Bum lovers know that layering this trio results in addictively soft-feeling skin and an even more irresistible fragrance. Experience the cult-fave scent from head-to-toe..This Set Contains:
ingredients: -Guaranu00e1: Contains caffeine to help support natural circulation, energy, and smooth skin..-Cupuau00e7u Butter: Contains fatty-acids, Phytosterols, and Polyphenols to lock in moisture and support a more elastic appearance..-Au00e7au00ed Oil: Provides antioxidants which help protect skinu2019s youthful appearance... Brazilian Bum Bum Cream: .Water, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dodecane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Fragrance, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Mica, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuau00e7u) Seed Butter, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Paullinia Cupana (Guaranu00e1) Seed Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix De Coco) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Au00e7au00ed) Fruit Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot/Carotte) Seed Oil, Ilex Guayusa Leaf Extract, Ilex Paraguariensis Leaf Extract, Bertholletia Excelsa (Brazil Nut/Noix du Bresil) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Coumarin, Limonene...Brazilian 4 Play Moisturizing Shower Cream Gel:. Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Glycol Stearate, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbeth-230 Tetraoleate, Decyl Glucoside, Sorbitan Laurate, Polyquaternium-7, Sorbic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, BHT, Sodium Benzoate, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuau00e7u) Seed Butter, Euterpe Oleracea (Au00e7au00ed) Fruit Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix de Coco) Oil...Brazilian Crush Body Fragrance Mist: .SD Alcohol 40-B (Alcohol Denat.), Water, Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Butyphenyl Methylpropional, Courmarin, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Brazilian Bum Bum Cream: .-Massage in a circular motion to create warmth for better absorption. .-For your bum bum, legs, tummy, arms, and all over the body...Brazilian Moisturizing 4 Play Shower Cream-Gel: .-Gently massage and work into wet skin. The cream-gel will transform into rich, luscious froth as you go. .-Rinse away...Brazilian Crush Body Fragrance Mist: .-Use all over the body. .-Spray on hair, clothes, and lingerie for a lingering scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally purchased this set for vacation and fell in love with most of the products. I wish I could lather myself in this shower gel forever! It is so moisturizing and creamy that it kept my skin super soft on vacation when I had to shower multiple times a day because of the heat. The cream itself is pretty good and smells super nice but I should have known myself better and find that I don't like putting fragranced moisturizer on my body most of the time so I haven't used much of it. Just be aware of your preferences.  The spray of course smells nice but I don't wear fragrance too often and when I do, I find it can fade pretty quickly which can be good or bad depending on preferences.  Final thoughts: out of the products I would pick up the shower gel again but skip on the rest due to my preferences.

reviews.review_text: I really have issues with HEADACHES on some scents, so I decided to buy this small set and if I really liked it, I would purchase the full price of that item. For the shower cream gel, I only smelled it when I open the cap. As I showered, I left it a couple of minutes and the smell would go away after rinsing and drying myself. I even tried putting the mist right away when I dried myself the mist does not  last. Alone itself the mist would last me like 10min max and it was gone.THIS company has better versions  of mists  that do last , I really really wanted to try the Brazilian bum bum cream as I was reading reviews of customers that the product did  work on them. There was not a timeframe That people would say it long it took to see results on them, but everyone is different. this little 1.7ounce so far since I purchased it. I haven't seen any help. I might have to buy the full 8 oz for $44  to see how long will it take, but I don't think I would purchase any of these again. I am not a Sephora employee nor I receive a promotion for this. It's  just my honest opinion
